verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jeru means Yahweh who gives us life
Salem means Yahweh who gives us peace
Yahweh who gives us life He will give us Peace
Yahweh who gives us life He will give us Peace

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jeru means Yahweh who gives us life
Salem means Yahweh who gives us peace
Yahweh who gives us life He will give us Peace
Yahweh who gives us life He will give us Peace

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Giver of life........Giver of peace
Where Jew and Gentile will fall on their knees
Temple rebuilt - Yahashua returns

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
Kingdom of God. - for Gentile and Jew
The Olive mountain will be split into two
When Yeshua Ha-Mashiach return
